body: Please can someone post below what Avicus Skype is I'm sure they have one and i have Avicus on teamspeak just wanted to look at the Skype !
body_tagged: Please can someone post below what Avicus Skype is I'm sure they have one and i have Avicus on teamspeak just wanted to look at the Skype !
title: Avicus Skype ?

replies.body: There is no Avicus Skype account as such, however the Administrators have their own accounts.
replies.body_tagged: There is no Avicus Skype account as such, however the Administrators have their own accounts.

replies.body: Okey Thank You and do you know when people get interviewed is that on Skype or team speak ?
replies.body_tagged: Okey Thank You and do you know when people get interviewed is that on Skype or team speak ?

replies.body: If you get accepted for interview, the interview will be held in TeamSpeak. :)
replies.body_tagged: If you get accepted for interview, the interview will be held in TeamSpeak. :)

reply_to.body: Okey Thank You and do you know when people get interviewed is that on Skype or team speak ?
reply_to.body_tagged: Okey Thank You and do you know when people get interviewed is that on Skype or team speak ?

replies.body: But, if you are having troubles with Teamspeak on the day, Skype can be used as a back up for the interview.
replies.body_tagged: But, if you are having troubles with Teamspeak on the day, Skype can be used as a back up for the interview.

reply_to.body: If you get accepted for interview, the interview will be held in TeamSpeak. :)
reply_to.body_tagged: If you get accepted for interview, the interview will be held in TeamSpeak. :)
